component.name: LoadingScene
component.script:
function init() as void m.grp = m.top.FindNode("grp") m.lbl = m.top.FindNode("lbl") m.lib = m.top.FindNode("SampleComponentLib") m.lib.observeField("loadStatus", "onLoadStatusChanged") end function
function onLoadStatusChanged() as void if (m.lib.loadStatus = "ready") 'Load Main Screen m.mainScreen = CreateObject("roSGNode", "MainScreen") m.grp.removeChild(m.lbl) m.lbl = invalid m.grp.appendChild(m.mainScreen) endif end function
